SEARCH
Package gw.cc.activity.entity

Interface ActivityDesktopView

All Superinterfaces:
ActivityView, com.guidewire.pl.system.entity.PermissionAssignableCheck
All Known Subinterfaces:
ActivityUnassignedView
public interface ActivityDesktopView extends com.guidewire.pl.system.entity.PermissionAssignableCheck, ActivityView
ActivityDesktopView displays activities efficiently in the desktop pages.

  • Field Details

    • finder

      static final PublicActivityDesktopViewFinder finder
      Instance of PublicActivityDesktopViewFinder.

  • Method Details

    • canApprove

      boolean canApprove()
      Returns a boolean indicating whether or not the given activity can be approved. Returns true iff:

      1) the activity is of type Approval 2) the activity is of status Open 3) the activity is Assigned 4) the activity is either assigned to the given user or the user has the "approveany" permission

      Returns:
      true if the Activity can be approved, false otherwise

    • canSkip

      boolean canSkip()
      Returns true if the user can skip the activity based on the following:

      1) the activity is a GENERAL or APPROVAL_DENIED activity 2) the activity is open 3) the activity is assigned 4) the activity is not mandatory 5) the activity is not assigned to a queue 6) the user has permission to modify the activity.

      Returns:
      true if the user can skip the Activity, false otherwise

    • canComplete

      boolean canComplete()
      Returns a boolean indicating whether or not the given activity can be completed. Returns true iff:

      1) the activity is of type General or FNOL 2) the activity is of status Open 3) the activity is Assigned 4) the activity is not assigned to a queue 5) the user has the modify activity permission for this activity

      Note this test does not check anything particular to the activity and its requirements for completion -- i.e. in the case of FNOL activities, this method will return true even when the FNOL activity completion prerequisits (that the claim is valid) are not met.

      Returns:
      true if the given Activity can be completed, false otherwise

    • isUpdatedSinceLastViewed

      boolean isUpdatedSinceLastViewed()
      Returns a boolean indicating whether or not this activity was updated since the last time it was viewed. The exact sequence is:
      1. Return false if the activity is not open
      2. Return false if the activity is not assigned to the current user
      3. Has the activity ever been viewed? If not (never viewed) return false if the current user created the activity, true otherwise
      4. Otherwise, return true if someone else has updated the activity since the current user viewed it, false otherwise
      Returns:
      true if this Activity was updated since the last time it was viewed, false otherwise

    • getClaimant

      String getClaimant()
      Returns the name of the Claimant associated with this activity.
      Returns:
      the name of the Claimant associated with this activity

    • getExposure

      String getExposure()
      Returns the Exposure associated with this activity. If no exposure is directly associated, finds all exposures owned by the Claimant associated with this activity's claim.
      Returns:
      the Exposure associated with this Activity
